sentence.Network_en: These young adventurers wear light mail or light brigandine armour and carry an axe.
sentence.Network_cn: 步行波耶骑兵身穿轻型链甲或镶甲,手持长斧,极为骁勇善战.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B) ... brigandage 抢劫 brigandine 锁子铠 brigantine 双桅帆船.
道具 - Mabinogi 奇幻世界 ... 古罗马胸甲 - Lorica Segmentatie 特殊铠甲 - Brigandine 锁子甲的外套 - Surcoat Chain Mail.
animism的意思中文翻译 ... bright 明亮的, 辉煌的, 欢快的, 聪明的, 伶俐的 brigandine 铠甲的一种 brigantine 双桅帆船的一种.

list.abs: Italians are world renowned for their love the crossbow none more so then the Genoese . these wealthy militia are equipped with brigandine armour , a large Pavise style shield , and a sword .一般类型：都市民兵意大利民族对弩弓的钟爱天下闻名，热那亚人更为视弩如命，因此将领们不惜为弩弓部队装备镶甲、全身巨盾和长剑。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French, from brigand (see brigand)

means.word_mean: 1. a medieval coat of chain mail consisting of metal rings sewn onto leather or cloth
